CustomField.description: By looking at firm practice groups, indicates the risk solution segments to which the firm belongs
CustomField.formula: IF ( Intapp_Master_Ranking__c <= 331, "Ethics; ", "") & IF (OR (INCLUDES(Firm_Practice_Groups__c , "M&A - Top-Ranked"), INCLUDES(Firm_Practice_Groups__c , "Securities & CapMrkts - Top-Ranked")), "Price-Sensitive; ", "") & IF (OR (INCLUDES(Firm_Practice_Groups__c , "Health Care - Top-Ranked"), INCLUDES(Firm_Practice_Groups__c , "Labor & Employment - Top-Ranked")), "Privacy; ", "") & IF ( Intapp_Master_Ranking__c <= 25, "Jurisdictions; ", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By looking at firm practice groups, indicates the risk solution segments to which the firm belongs
CustomField.label: Risk Segments
